ul.li: New API call EqfAddCTIDList to associate a Global Memory option file to a TM folder
New folder properties page for the review and modification of Global Memory options
Added new translation memory indicators to the memory proposal window of the Translation Environment similar to the dictionary indicators in the dictionary window.
TM tracks and collects MTLOG-file information even across several shipments
TM supports "Hamster" matches (matches coming from a global memory search) by treating it as EXACT-matches, but TM doesn't replace it automatically. The translators must accept it manually.
